# What is OpenSeadragon Viewer?
This visualization provides a powerful way to view high-resolution, zoomable images directly in your browser. Supported formats include PNG, JPG, GIF and others.
After selecting a dataset, the OpenSeadragon viewer will appear, allowing you to smoothly zoom, pan, and examine high-resolution imagery with excellent performance.
This viewer is powered by [OpenSeadragon](https://openseadragon.github.io/), an open-source, web-based viewer for high-resolution zoomable images.
## Key Features
- **Smooth Zooming**: Navigate gigapixel images with fluid zoom and pan controls - **Multi-Resolution Support**: Efficiently loads only the needed image tiles - **Versatile Format Support**: Works with standard images and specialized formats - **Advanced Controls**: Includes navigation aids, fullscreen mode, and rotation - **Touch-Friendly**: Works perfectly on both desktop and mobile devices
For more information about OpenSeadragon and its capabilities, visit: [https://openseadragon.github.io/](https://openseadragon.github.io/)
